page.title: 06HOME LIFE.4.
page.content: A Day in the Life of Naomi Game. A typical day for me is to get up in a morning,go downstairs to have some breakfast,I usually have cornflakes and glass of milk.I then go up-stairs to have a wash,clean my teeth and sometimes wash my hair.When I have finished I get dressed and go to school. School starts at 8.55 a.m. and I usually arrive at school at 8.45 a.m..We have different lessons every day but we always have at least one lesson of maths and one lesson of integrated studies.We have nine lessons a day.When the bell rings at 3.30p.m.I go home,get changed,have a snack before doing my piano practice.We usually have dinner at 5.30p.m. Most nights I do swimming training andtwo nights I do gymnastics.Each night I go to bed at 9.30p.m..
